name: Home Away
description:
This is a story driven game where you got to your died uncle house to find the deed to to the  house. but there is a twist you need to find the different diary notes that are scattered around the house. as this notes have the corresponding code on the to open the safe door where the deed is located. 

this is a link to a survey if you could please feel it out 

 https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2dIA2BMJ_OkrVLak20mAtJ9CHiUDGRSkae-9G...
